name: subgraph-protocol-v2
description: This package contains subgraph of the protocol v2

scripts.prepare:all: npm run prepare:contracts && npm run prepare:subgraph
scripts.prepare:subgraph: mustache ./config/${NETWORK:-dev}.json ./templates/${BLOCKCHAIN:-ethereum}.subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && rm -rf generated && npm run generate:schema && npm run subgraph:codegen
scripts.deploy:hosted:kovan: VERSION=v2 BLOCKCHAIN=ethereum NETWORK=kovan env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=aave/protocol-v2-kovan env-cmd npm run subgraph:deploy:hosted
scripts.deploy:hosted:mainnet: VERSION=v2 BLOCKCHAIN=ethereum NETWORK=mainnet env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=aave/protocol-v2 env-cmd npm run subgraph:deploy:hosted
scripts.deploy:hosted:matic: VERSION=v2 BLOCKCHAIN=matic NETWORK=matic env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=aave/aave-v2-matic env-cmd npm run subgraph:deploy:hosted
scripts.deploy:hosted:mumbai: VERSION=v2 BLOCKCHAIN=matic NETWORK=mumbai env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=aave/aave-v2-polygon-mumbai env-cmd npm run subgraph:deploy:hosted
scripts.deploy:hosted:fuji: VERSION=v2 BLOCKCHAIN=avalanche NETWORK=fuji env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=aave/protocol-v2-fuji env-cmd npm run subgraph:deploy:hosted
scripts.deploy:hosted:avalanche: VERSION=v2 BLOCKCHAIN=avalanche NETWORK=avalanche env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=aave/protocol-v2-avalanche env-cmd npm run subgraph:deploy:hosted
scripts.deploy:hosted:arbitrum-rinkeby: VERSION=v3 BLOCKCHAIN=arbitrum NETWORK=arbitrum-rinkeby env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=aave/protocol-v3-arbitrum-rinkeby env-cmd npm run subgraph:deploy:hosted
scripts.deploy:hosted:arbitrum: VERSION=v3 BLOCKCHAIN=arbitrum NETWORK=arbitrum env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=aave/protocol-v3-arbitrum env-cmd npm run subgraph:deploy:hosted
scripts.deploy:hosted:mainnet-arc: VERSION=v2-arc BLOCKCHAIN=ethereum-arc NETWORK=mainnet-arc env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=aave/aave-arc env-cmd npm run subgraph:deploy:hosted
scripts.deploy:hosted:mainnet-centrifuge: VERSION=v2-arc BLOCKCHAIN=ethereum-arc NETWORK=mainnet-centrifuge env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=aave/aave-centrifuge env-cmd npm run subgraph:deploy:hosted

author: AAVE <tech@aave.com>
